segment.source: Publishing Servers Results Pane Columns
segment.target: Publishing Servers Results Pane Columns

segment.source: Publishing Servers Results Pane Columns
segment.target: Publishing Servers Results Pane Columns

segment.source: Publishing Servers Results Pane Columns
segment.target: Publishing Servers Results Pane Columns

segment.source: The Publishing Servers Results pane can display a variety of columns.
segment.target: The Publishing Servers Results pane can display a variety of columns.

segment.source: Name, URL, and Next Refresh are shown by default.
segment.target: Name, URL, and Next Refresh are shown by default.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You can add or remove a column simply by right-clicking in the Results pane, selecting View, then selecting Add/Remove Columns.
segment.target: You can add or remove a column simply by right-clicking in the Results pane, selecting View, then selecting Add/Remove Columns.

segment.source: The list can be sorted by any of the columns.
segment.target: The list can be sorted by any of the columns.

segment.source: Columns that contain dates and times are sorted in chronological order, not alphabetical.
segment.target: Columns that contain dates and times are sorted in chronological order, not alphabetical.

segment.source: For columns that contain a mix of dates and times and text (for example, Next Refresh), dates and times are considered to come before any other text.
segment.target: For columns that contain a mix of dates and times and text (for example, Next Refresh), dates and times are considered to come before any other text.

segment.source: The available column names contain the following elements.
segment.target: The available column names contain the following elements.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: The display name for the server.
segment.target: The display name for the server.

segment.source: URL
segment.target: URL

segment.source: The protocol, server name, server port, and path combined into a URL.
segment.target: The protocol, server name, server port, and path combined into a URL.

segment.source: Next User Refresh
segment.target: Next User Refresh

segment.source: The next time a refresh is scheduled for the current user.
segment.target: The next time a refresh is scheduled for the current user.

segment.source: Displays the time if periodic refreshes are set up.
segment.target: Displays the time if periodic refreshes are set up.

segment.source: Displays On Login if the server is set to refresh only on login.
segment.target: Displays On Login if the server is set to refresh only on login.

segment.source: Displays Manual if automatic refresh is not enabled.
segment.target: Displays Manual if automatic refresh is not enabled.

segment.source: Default Refresh Policy
segment.target: Default Refresh Policy

segment.source: Displays Manual, On Login, or Periodic to describe how the server is configured.
segment.target: Displays Manual, On Login, or Periodic to describe how the server is configured.

segment.source: Host
segment.target: Host

segment.source: The name or IP address for the server.
segment.target: The name or IP address for the server.

segment.source: Type
segment.target: Type

segment.source: Displays HTTP or Virtual Application to indicate the server type.
segment.target: Displays HTTP or Virtual Application to indicate the server type.

segment.source: Port
segment.target: Port

segment.source: The port on the server to be used.
segment.target: The port on the server to be used.

segment.source: Path
segment.target: Path

segment.source: The path on the server (generally just "/" for Application Virtualization Servers).
segment.target: The path on the server (generally just "/" for Application Virtualization Servers).

segment.source: Last User Refresh
segment.target: Last User Refresh

segment.source: The time the last refresh occurred for the current user.
segment.target: The time the last refresh occurred for the current user.

segment.source: Last System Refresh
segment.target: Last System Refresh

segment.source: The last time a refresh happened from this server for any user.
segment.target: The last time a refresh happened from this server for any user.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Publishing Servers Node
segment.target: Publishing Servers Node

segment.source: Publishing Servers Results Pane
segment.target: Publishing Servers Results Pane
